definitions: with reference to the outer surface or structure of something; outside

examples.text: the antenna should be mounted externally, perhaps on the roof

shortDefinitions: with reference to outer surface or structure of something

definitions: (used in reference to a medicine or similar substance) on the outside of the body

examples.text: the oil is externally applied to treat bruises and rheumatic complaints

shortDefinitions: on outside of body (used in reference to medicine or similar substance)

definitions: used to indicate that something occurs or comes from a source outside the institution, country, or subject affected

examples.text: most exam papers are marked externally

shortDefinitions: used to indicate that something occurs or comes from source outside institution, country, or subject affected

definitions: using a disk or tape drive rather than the main memory

examples.text: all data that has been stored externally will be easy to retrieve

shortDefinitions: using disk or tape drive rather than main memory
